projects.projectDes: Artwork I created for a personal up-skilling project in illustration using Adobe Illustrator. The majority of these explore dot shading as a way to give them a 3D touch.

A brand refresh for my Iwi Ngati Kuia, who are located in Nelson. I’ve been involved in multiple projects including the design of their Hauora Research Publication that looks into the perspectives and experiences of the Iwi.
A free project for Black Dog Brew Co and the Wellington Free Ambulance during my time at DUSK. It involved creating a poster for BlackDog's new brew for charity called Ambrewlance.
